## Description

A collection of utility functions for using Ryacas.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `yacR` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/yacR) with:

```r
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/yacR")
```

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/yacR/index.html)
for package documentation.
